description:
misc/cgo/test: relax the threshold in test3250.
Fixes build for some slow FreeBSD/NetBSD/Darwin builder.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c6128b5615d6 ***

misc/cgo/test: relax the threshold in test3250.
Fixes build for some slow FreeBSD/NetBSD/Darwin builder.

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11207043

LGTM

Happy to fix the build, unhappy about the arbitrariness of these numbers.

LGTM

At least 1 feels less arbitrary than 5. :-)

subject: code review 11207043: misc/cgo/test: relax the threshold in test3250.
